name: MechMedic
description:
Crater City; stories of all kinds and colours are told about this place. Riches, Weapons, and Unlimited Power, are all whispered to lie inside, all fabled to be around or within The Great Mech. The stories speak not of its origin, who made it, or what for. Only that it’s the most ancient structure on Earth, untouched for centuries by Earth’s hard and skittish people. 

In this exploratory platformer, Players will traverse a unique and ambient arena, collecting boosts, and finding the light in the darkness of Crater City. 

This game is best played with a controller. 

Created by The Gouda Squad for GGJ 2020, still in production until 2/22. We'd love to hear your feedback, which you can give us through this google form!
